entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8.0 Preview 5/6 - WinUI TimePicker needs to expose additional properties #16095
  • .NET 8.0 Preview 5/6 - WinUI shadows are broken #16094
  • .NET 8.0 Preview 5/6 - Unable to edit project properties #16092
  • .NET 8 Preview 6 MAUI project fails to build for Android in the command line as it's unable to detect the Android SDK path #16091
  • Unable to add an image to a MAUI app project and build it #16089
  • CarouselView imagebutton image tapgester not recognized inside oa Carouselview #16088
    Backlog
  • TabbedPage disappears if the UI is kill with a foreground service started #16087
    Backlog
  • When I try to compile and run the MAUI project, I get an APT2000 error #16081
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Bug] On iOS, SafeArea returns Thickness of zero #2657
    Backlog
  • Cannot swipe on Windows (with mouse) #6152
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Revert #7642 for .NET 7.0 #7643
    .NET 8 Planning
  • StateContainer always returns infinity as height #16085
  • Right click to 'Archive for Publishing' iOS projects with native binding projects fail due to Android OS versions #16072
  • .net8 preview 5 not working with latest visual studio for Mac #15965

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16093
    backport/suggested
  • Prevent refresh command from executing when CanExecute is false #16090
  • Null check small refactoring #16086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.2 to 2.5.0 #16084
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump xunit.runner.utility from 2.4.2 to 2.5.0 #16083
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump xunit.runner.visualstudio from 2.4.5 to 2.5.0 #16082
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎

Updated

  • Make Add/Remove Logical public #16046
    area/layout 🔲, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮, area/FlyoutPage, area/modal, control-swipeview, area/ListView, control-border
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢
  • Move most controls to use ModifyMapping (and variants) #15058
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16032
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Just trying out some things #15000
    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • Use AppendToMapping for Element and VisualElement #14948
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks; #16078
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Android has issues with Entry #16077
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-map
  • [iOS] Change the impl of the event handler to use a notification center to avoid circular refs. #15064
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-editor
